DOC.brief_summary: This study is a Post-Market Surveillance study in Korea to evaluate the safety and efficacy of dexamethasone 700 ㎍ (OZURDEX®) intravitreal implant used to treat Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion, Central Retinal Vein Occlusion, or non-infectious uveitis affecting the posterior segment of the eye in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Dexamethasone (OZURDEX®) Intravitreal Implant in Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients with Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion, Central Retinal Vein Occlusion, or noninfectious uveitis affecting the posterior segment of the eye treated with (OZURDEX®) in clinical practice. Patients with eye infections Patients with glaucoma.
